author: IGN
description:
Stormgate: Campaign One – Ashes of Earth is available now on Steam. Watch the Stormgate: Campaign One – Ashes of Earth launch trailer for this free-to-play real-time strategy game. 

Stormgate's Ashes of Earth campaign features the replayable 12 mission Vanguard campaign, including three free missions. Ashes of Earth also features three asymmetric factions (the human Vanguard, the demonic Infernal Host, and the angelic Celestial Armada), along with voice cast (featuring Simu Liu, Tara Strong, Matt Mercer, and more), and more.

#Stormgate #Gaming #IGN
title: Stormgate: Campaign One - Ashes of Earth - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Stormgate reviewed by Leana Hafer on PC.

As a competitive RTS, Stormgate is what's next. Or at least, I hope it is. It pushes that classic basecraft formula forward with a veteran's eye for what works and what doesn't, and gets me pumped to queue up again right after I finish a match – win or lose – in a way I haven't been since the early days of Wings of Liberty. The campaign has come a long way since the rough state it was in for the Early Access launch, while it still has some rough edges. The road ahead still feels long, and I genuinely hope it has the chance to become everything it wants to be some day. It's already a special game, though, combining the familiar and the fresh into a satisfying RTS experience.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Stormgate Review

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Danny Phantom Reveal Trailer for Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny, an upcoming action RPG developed by Game Mill Entertainment. Players can get a look at everyone's favorite phantom with Danny Phantom making his way to the game. Danny Phantom wields the ability to phase in and out of combat to fend off the forces of evil. Make use of his Ectoplasm Punch, Energy Blast, and more to gain the upper hand. Play as Danny Phantom in Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny, launching on September 30 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny - Official Danny Phantom Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Official Trailer for Rental Family, an upcoming comedy-drama distributed by Searchlight Pictures. Explore the journey of unexpected connections in Rental Family, in theaters on November 21.

Set against modern-day Tokyo, an American actor who struggles to find purpose until he lands an unusual gig: working for a Japanese "rental family" agency, playing stand-in roles for strangers. As he immerses himself in his clients’ worlds, he begins to form genuine bonds that blur the lines between performance and reality. Confronting the moral complexities of his work, he rediscovers purpose, belonging, and the quiet beauty of human connection.

Rental Family stars Brendan Fraser, Takehiro Hira, Mari Yamamoto, Nihi, Akira Emoto, and more. The film is directed by Hikari and produced by Eddie Vaisman, p.g.a, Julia Lebedev, p.g.a, HIKARI, p.g.a, Shin Yamaguchi, p.g.a.

Rental Family is in theaters on November 21.
title: Rental Family - Official Trailer (2025) Brendan Fraser, Takehiro Hira, Mari Yamamoto

author: IGN
description:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 35th Anniversary adds more theaters and screening dates to its Summer 2025 re-release August 15th-21st. Go to FathomEntertainment.com to get tickets now and to find the theater nearest you:  https://hubs.ly/Q03tq_4m0

Check out the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 35th Anniversary theatrical run trailer for the original 1990 superhero film of the comic book adaptation starring the iconic characters Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello, and Raphael. From New Line Cinema and directed by the legendary film and music video director Steve Barron, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 35th Anniversary will also present the Turtles Unmasked featurette. 

Produced in collaboration with the creators of TMNT: Evolution, Mutation & Reboot, the featurette showcases before the movie—never-before-seen footage from the archives, extended scenes left to history on the cutting room floor, home-recorded behind-the-scenes footage, and 1-on-1 time and commentary with Barron, as he reflects o
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 35th Anniversary Re-Release - "Find Them" Theatrical Run Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Disney+ Release Date Trailer for Lilo & Stitch, a live-action reindition of the classic animated series distributed by Walt Disney Pictures. Take home one of the most successful animated films of the year with Lilo & Stitch, streaming on Disney+ on September 3.

Disney's Lilo & Stitch stars Sydney Elizebeth Agudong, Billy Magnussen, Tia Carrere, Hannah Waddingham, Chris Sanders, with Courtney B. Vance, and Zach Galifianakis, and introducing Maia Kealoha. 

Lilo & Stitch follows the story of a lonely Hawaiian girl and the fugitive alien who helps to mend her broken family. The film is directed by Dean Fleischer Camp, with a screenplay by Chris Kekaniokalani Bright and Mike Van Waes. Lilo & Stitch is produced by Jonathan Eirich, p.g.a. and Dan Lin, with Tom Peitzman, Ryan Halprin, Louie Provost, Thomas Schumacher serving as executive producers.

Disney's Lilo & Stitch is streaming on Disney+ on September 3.

#IGN #Lilo&Stitch #Disney+
title: Lilo & Stitch - Official Disney+ Release Date Trailer (2025) Maia Kealoha, Billy Magnussen

author: IGN
description:
Find out where to look for cleverly hidden Easter eggs that pay homage to everything from the first Jurassic Park film to other Steven Spielberg classics in this exclusive behind the scenes featurette from Jurassic World Rebirth.

After a record-breaking box office debut, Jurassic World Rebirth is now available to own or rent for the first time exclusively on Digital platforms tomorrow, and on 4K UHD, Blu-ray and DVD September 9, 2025, from Universal Pictures Home Entertainment and Amblin Entertainment.  

Audiences can now go even deeper with over one hour of exclusive content when you buy, including never-before-seen deleted scenes with extra dinosaur mayhem, an alternate opening, a long-form making-of documentary detailing the film’s jaw-dropping visuals and sound design, and much more.
 
A new era is born. A covert extraction team races to the most dangerous place on Earth, an island research facility where dinosaurs too deadly for the original Jurassic Park were left behind. Thei
title: Jurassic World Rebirth - Exclusive Easter Eggs Featurette (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into the battle system of Suikoden: Star Leap in this latest trailer for the upcoming mobile game. The new Suikoden: Star Leap trailer shows what you can expect from the combat of this RPG, including the timeline battle system, secret techniques, chain attacks, party composition, large-scale war battles, and more. Suikoden: Star Leap will be available on PC (Steam), iOS, and Android.

Solar Year 453. Tragedy strikes a lakeside village located east to the Scarlet Moon Empire, where mysterious enemies attack, houses go up in flames, and people have to flee for their lives.

After the threat leaves, the Hero, along with Hisui, Shirin, and Shapur stand up to restore the village.
As the Hero and his friends depart for their journey, they quickly get caught up in the great swells of history. What are the atrocities that torment the people of the Empire? What kind of destiny will these encounters with Viktor, Flik, Odessa, and various others lead to? Small adventures eventual
title: Suikoden: Star Leap - Official Battle Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Karma: The Dark World gets a new trailer and an Xbox release date announcement. Check out the latest Karma: The Dark World trailer for this first-person cinematic psychological horror game, where you will be investigating the deepest secrets of your suspects’ minds. The new Karma: The Dark World trailer shows more of its twisted world, along with the exclusive green Xbox filter mode available as part of the Xbox version release. Karma: The Dark World will be available on Xbox on September 10, 2025.

Set in an alternate timeline where post-war Germany has fallen into a dystopian state, ruled over by the Leviathan Corporation using mass surveillance and mind bending technology - what starts out as another case for Roam Agent Daniel McGovern, sees him uncover a world of deceit and betrayal, where he begins to doubt everything he knows, including his own identity.

#IGN #Karma #Xbox
title: Karma: The Dark World - Official Xbox Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Alien: Earth, the latest in the long running franchise built on the exoskeleton of one of the scariest movie monsters ever created, drops its first season with a confident and vibesy evolution. Simultaneously providing fans with the eggs (Easter and Xenomorph) they expect, and shedding concerns of fitting into continuity, Noah Hawley has made an amazing piece of science fiction on the strength of solid production and creature design, an incredible cast, and surprising needle drops that make me want a cigarette. 
 
Alien: Earth also has more in common with Star Wars and Andor than you might think, with both series serving as prequels to some truly iconic sci fi of late 70s cinema. Timothy Olyphant having a blast playing a synthetic in the Ash or Bishop mode, while Babou Ceesay offers a more human view on cyborgs and Sydney Chandler turns in an incredible performance as Wendy, a child whose consciousness is moved into a new supercomputer synth body. The series tugs on some interesting t
title: Alien: Earth | Full Season, Non-Spoiler Review
